comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: George Seres (), French cyclist: www.lordprice.co.uk/SPCY1005.html Thorvald Ellegaard (1877-1954) Danish cyclist: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thorvald_Ellegaard Cesare Moretti Sr. (b. 1885), Italian cyclist. www.cyclingarchives.com/coureurfiche.php?coureurid=19923 de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cesare_Moretti_sr. These three arrived in New York on the Rochambeau on May 12, 1915, to ride at the new Sheepshead Bay Velodrome. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FA0912FC3E5A15738...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca for filling in the picture of who these men were and why they came. We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
